name: market for operation, computer, laptop, standby/sleep mode | operation, computer, laptop, standby/sleep mode | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8743/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'operation, computer, laptop, standby/sleep mode', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;The 'operation, computer, laptop, standby/sleep mode' is delivering the service of operation of a laptop computer in the standby/sleep mode for one hour of use. The laptop is assumed to have an average electricity consumption of 4W, a a lifetime of 4 years and 2 hours of standby/sleep mode every day. The operation includes the use of laptop computer and the electricity consumption.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
